replies.body: As a streamer this will add to the ways I can continually interact and create content with my viewers, and gain feedback from them. Looking forward to testing this out and learning more.
Thats a really cool way to use a club!

I agree, this will help me and who knows i might start to get more viewers ahaha

But this is an awesome feature i must admit.

Exactly!. 

ive been streaming for a while now and it was getting way to hard to remember every person from there league user and twitch user. hopefully they make a way of seeing others twitch profiles threw the club tabs.

atm most my followers are {{summoner:6}}  's on the league client.
I sent you a friend request, I'd love to play some matches with you! ^_^ (I prefer adc/top)
Yo! I recognised your username and it turned out I versed you in an aram match, I was the darius
Cool man! I usually play them to wind down.
What's your stream?
https://www.twitch.tv/fieryfennec
first rule of the cool kids club is.......
Don't spell cool or club with a K?
...don't talk about the cKc
I have an issue where I can't create/join "Taylor Swift" or "Taylor Swift Fan Club" please help.

OMG why didn't I think of creating a Taytay club {{item:3070}} 

The reason you can't create the club is because it has already been created by another summoner. I'll see if I can help you get invited.
I can also get an invite please!!
You should get an invite from the owner shortly!

The owner is currently offline. But when they go online, I'll ask them to send an invite! Or maybe ILoveTaylorSwift can invite you?
Unfortunately I can't invite as I'm not part of the club; hit my 3 club limit :(
Super best friends fans?
is there a reason why i cant add a tag?{{item:3070}}
You should be able to after you have 5 approved members in the club
Hia Maraudaur, what do you mean by "approved" members? Because we have 5 members in our club but once we get into loading screen or in game we don't have a tag.
Is there any plans of raising the club limit? I've capped out and want to join more. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Can i change a club tag?
if not are there any plans for that to be enabled?
Is there any way to change a clan tag if you accidentally make a mistake {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
will the option be added to edit the club tag? my current club has a typo in the tag and its a hassle to re-invite 30 people over a simple edit.
JOIN MY MAGA CLUB! Let's Make America Great Again!
who cares about America this is OCE GTFO
But you're Silver III why would I join your Club.
Because he's Trump?
How can I find other clubs? I have a uni LAN in 2 weeks, but wanna see if i can find some people earlier

"We do have plans for the future that include being able to invite summoners by name, as well as the ability to search for clubs! We appreciate your patience as we work on these improvements but will keep everyone posted as we add new functionality. We definitely want to support players who want to create an open and friendly community for others. :3" - Limely

But you can find your Uni club here -http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/uni-clubs/

If they aren't there maybe think about creating your own uni club!
so i made a club and gave it a tag 'urgot' how do i then change the tag to something else?
I don't have any friends :(

Riot what the are requriemetns for a club tag?
You need at least 5 members in the group to create a club tag.
